Text.Page:
Morale'd improve if people had a hot meal, preferably with some meat.

Don't take this the wrong way, but we need strong spirits more than we need sharp weapons.

Think you can knock off a few of the boars around Dragonfall? They'd cook up well.

It may not seem heroic to a veteran like you, but giving people like this hope is sometimes the greater victory.

Thank you, .
If the people don't see some sign of improvement soon, I fear they'll break and abandon the town. That'd give our enemies a stronghold right outside of Kaiator.
